notes_display: Philip Alberti.  Alberti in red ink.  Visible flecks of mica.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: SIX PENCE.  THIS Bill shall pass current for Six Pence, according to an Act of General Assembly of the Common-wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twenties Day of Marchl, in the year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven.  Dated the tenth day of Apri
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is Death.| SIX PENCE. Philadelphia: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP.  1777.  SIX PENCE.
